nodeList.description: Lethal Mirage penetrates enemy physical resistance.

node.description: Lethal Mirage deals additional melee physical damage per equipped sword or dagger.

Lethal Mirage has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

Improves Lethal Mirage's base critical strike chance, but it has fewer Mirages, resulting in fewer hits.

node.altText:
Shadows will repeat one skill you use before vanishing. Shadows can repeat Acid Flask, Shurikens or Shadow Cascade, and their damage scales with your damage stats. 

You can have 3 Shadows at once, and they will disappear after 5 seconds.
node.description:
Lethal Mirage creates a {Shadow} at the location you disappear from.

This {Shadow} is not consumed by the {Shadow Eater} node.
Mirages have a chance to use {Shadow Cascade} in addition to their normal attack.
Lethal Mirage gains an additional Mirage, resulting in more hits.
Lethal Mirage grants you the {Haste} buff, granting 30% increased movement speed.
Lethal Mirage deals additional melee physical damage per equipped sword or dagger.
A circular attack that's also used by your shadow clones. Requires dual wielding.
Lethal Mirage deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and leeches a portion of the melee damage dealt as health.

nodeList.altText:
Blinded enemies have 50% less critical hit chance and are less accurate at range for 4 seconds. Does not stack.

Frailty causes enemies to deal 6% less damage per stack for 4 seconds (multiplicative with other modifiers). Stacking up to 3 times.
nodeList.description: The smoke from {Umbral Burst} persists as a cloud blinding enemies and inflicting {Frailty} each second.

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.
